about_the_game:
From the big screen to your own game, the Fast X Car Pack puts iconic vehicles from Fast X into your hands.

Welcome Fast X’s iconic rides like the 1970 Dodge Charger, 1966 Chevrolet Impala Super Sport, 1973 Datsun 240Z, 2022 Dodge Charger SRT Hellcat Redeye Widebody, and the 2022 Flip Car 2.0 to the Horizon Festival.

*Requires Forza Horizon 5 (game sold separately). Not included with the Forza Horizon 5 Car Pass, Standard, Deluxe or Premium Editions.
detailed_description:
From the big screen to your own game, the Fast X Car Pack puts iconic vehicles from Fast X into your hands.

Welcome Fast X’s iconic rides like the 1970 Dodge Charger, 1966 Chevrolet Impala Super Sport, 1973 Datsun 240Z, 2022 Dodge Charger SRT Hellcat Redeye Widebody, and the 2022 Flip Car 2.0 to the Horizon Festival.

*Requires Forza Horizon 5 (game sold separately). Not included with the Forza Horizon 5 Car Pass, Standard, Deluxe or Premium Editions.

short_description: This blockbuster DLC includes iconic vehicles like the 1970 Dodge Charger, 1966 Chevrolet Impala Super Sport, 1973 Datsun 240Z, 2022 Dodge Charger SRT Hellcat Redeye Widebody, and the 2022 Flip Car 2.0 to drive and race in the Horizon Festival.
